publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1739# Mr Gil Paterson: Chidren and the Internet—That the Parliament is gravely concerned at the high incidence of paedophiles contacting children through Internet chat rooms; believes that, in light of the increased use of the Internet by school children, it is imperative that adequate screening and filtering software be provided to protect children from the dangers of the Internet, and encourages the provision, along with any protective measures, of adequate resources dedicated to policing the Internet and prosecuting those who use it to approach, entice and damage children. Supported by: Michael Matheson*, Andrew Wilson*, Christine Grahame*, Mr David Davidson*, Richard Lochhead*, Tricia Marwick*, Brian Adam*, Michael Russell*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-1739# Chidren and the Internet (lodged on 9 March 2001) Shona Robison*, Tommy Sheridan*, Fergus Ewing*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S1M-1739# Chidren and the Internet (lodged on 9 March 2001) Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Alex Neil*, Fiona Hyslop*, Ms Sandra White*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Ben Wallace*
S1M-1739# Chidren and the Internet (lodged on 9 March 2001) Irene McGugan*

S1M-1739# Mr Gil Paterson: Chidren and the Internet—That the Parliament is gravely concerned at the high incidence of paedophiles contacting children through Internet chat rooms; believes that, in light of the increased use of the Internet by school children, it is imperative that adequate screening and filtering software be provided to protect children from the dangers of the Internet, and encourages the provision, along with any protective measures, of adequate resources dedicated to policing the Internet and prosecuting those who use it to approach, entice and damage children. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Andrew Wilson, Christine Grahame, Mr David Davidson, Richard Lochhead, Tricia Marwick, Brian Adam, Michael Russell, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Shona Robison, Tommy Sheridan, Fergus Ewing, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Adam Ingram, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Alex Neil, Fiona Hyslop, Ms Sandra White, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Ben Wallace, Irene McGugan
S1M-1739# Chidren and the Internet (lodged on 9 March 2001) Mr Duncan Hamilton*, Kay Ullrich*, Linda Fabiani*
S1M-1739# Chidren and the Internet (lodged on 9 March 2001) Donald Gorrie*
S1M-1739# Chidren and the Internet (lodged on 9 March 2001) Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*
